message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Bob, I appreciate you making an offer. While $15,000 is closer to what I'm looking for,  I can't go that low quite yet. How about we settle at $16,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $16,500 is a bit too rich for my blood. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can we meet in the middle again?

Bob, I understand where you're coming from, but $14,000 is cutting it a bit too close for me.  This product is truly top-of-the-line and worth every penny.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,250?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $15,250 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to go up to $14,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at $14,500?
